projects.title: Fikka NFT Marketplace
projects.description: Directed product design for Fikka.io, a pioneering NFT marketplace and WEB3 social media platform, enhancing user interaction and experience in the digital assets space.

projects.title: Lets Collect
projects.description: As the product designer of the groundbreaking project 'Lets Collect,' I crafted a dark and futuristic website with a logo resembling a QR code and vibrant neon colors. The platform allows users to become producers of the first NFT funded film. The website features different pages, including Mint, Our Story, Team, and Connect.

projects.title: QuantLabs Website
projects.description: As the product designer and UI/UX expert, I proudly present Quantlabs â€“ a futuristic website I crafted for a metaverse, NFT, and blockchain development company. With captivating visuals, user-friendly layout, and clear content, Quantlabs showcases the company's expertise, services, and insights. This cutting-edge platform reflects my passion for digital innovation and design.
